div.p: A Web Site is the host for a web application running in the cloud that you can control and manage. After you create a Web Site you can start, stop, and delete it whenever you need to. You can access the web site as easily as you access a web site hosted on a computer in your office.
Web Sites provides the ability to quickly and easily create and deploy web sites with support for multiple application frameworks and preloaded with popular open source applications.
To create a new Web Site, click the New icon, click Web Site, and then follow the instructions for Quick Create, From Gallery, or Custom Create.

Quick Create is the fastest method for creating a website, requiring only that you provide a URL. Quick Create doesn’t give you options for setting up a database, so consider using Quick Create when you don’t need database connectivity or plan to setup a database later.
Create a web site From Gallery when you want to quickly build a web site from a template. When you create a web site From Gallery you can have a web site up and running almost instantly.

Choose to Custom Create a Web Site when you want to create your website and other resources that you would like to use with your website simultaneously. This includes such things as setting up a database to use along with your site.
